name: Taiga
description: Agile project management platform with Kanban boards, sprints, and user stories. Perfect for software teams using Scrum or Kanban methodologies.

name: Kanboard
description: Minimalist Kanban board focused on simplicity and efficiency. Lightweight alternative to complex project management tools.

name: OpenProject
description: Comprehensive project management suite with Gantt charts, timelines, roadmaps, and resource management.

name: Wekan
description: Open-source Trello alternative with real-time collaboration and customizable boards.

name: Focalboard
description: Self-hosted alternative to Notion, Trello, and Asana. Part of the Mattermost family.

name: EspoCRM
description: Modern CRM system with sales automation, marketing campaigns, and customer support features.

name: SuiteCRM
description: Enterprise-grade open-source CRM forked from SugarCRM. Feature-rich with extensive customization options.

name: Monica
description: Personal CRM to organize interactions with friends and family. Remember birthdays, conversations, and important details.

name: Twenty
description: Modern open-source CRM with beautiful UI, built with React and TypeScript. Alternative to Salesforce.

name: Rocket.Chat
description: Enterprise team chat with video conferencing, file sharing, and integrations. Slack alternative.

name: Mattermost
description: Secure, self-hosted team collaboration platform with channels, integrations, and DevOps workflows.

name: Zulip
description: Powerful team chat with threaded conversations. Combines email threading with real-time chat.

name: Metabase
description: Business intelligence and analytics tool. Create dashboards and ask questions about your data without SQL.

name: Apache Superset
description: Modern data exploration and visualization platform. Create charts, dashboards, and share insights.

name: Redash
description: Connect to any data source, visualize and share your data. Built for data teams and analysts.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Advanced open-source relational database. Industry standard for reliability and data integrity.

name: MySQL
description: Popular open-source relational database. Fast, reliable, and widely used in web applications.

name: MongoDB
description: Document-oriented NoSQL database. Flexible schema for modern applications with JSON-like documents.

name: Redis
description: In-memory data structure store. Used as cache, message broker, and real-time database.

name: ClickHouse
description: Fast open-source column-oriented database for analytics. Handles billions of rows with sub-second queries.

name: Nextcloud
description: Self-hosted file sync and share platform. Google Drive alternative with calendar, contacts, and office suite.

name: Seafile
description: High-performance file sync and share solution. Ideal for teams with large files and collaboration needs.

name: MinIO
description: High-performance object storage compatible with S3 API. Perfect for cloud-native applications.

name: Pydio Cells
description: Modern file sharing and collaboration platform with advanced security features and workflow automation.

name: n8n
description: Workflow automation tool with 300+ integrations. Zapier alternative for developers.

name: Huginn
description: System for building agents that perform automated tasks. Create workflows that watch and react to events.

name: Automatisch
description: Open-source automation tool for connecting apps and services. Modern alternative to Zapier with visual workflow builder.

name: Grafana
description: Observability platform for metrics, logs, and traces. Create beautiful dashboards from any data source.

name: Prometheus
description: Open-source monitoring system with time-series database. Industry standard for metrics collection.

name: Uptime Kuma
description: Self-hosted monitoring tool. Check website uptime, SSL certificates, and get notifications.

name: Plausible Analytics
description: Privacy-friendly web analytics alternative to Google Analytics. Lightweight and GDPR compliant.

name: Umami
description: Simple, fast website analytics. Privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics.

name: Gitea
description: Lightweight self-hosted Git service. GitHub/GitLab alternative with minimal resource usage.

name: GitLab CE
description: Complete DevOps platform with Git repository, CI/CD, issue tracking, and container registry.

name: Jenkins
description: Leading open-source automation server. Build, test, and deploy with thousands of plugins.

name: Vaultwarden
description: Unofficial Bitwarden server written in Rust. Password manager with web vault and browser extensions.

name: Authentik
description: Open-source Identity Provider with SSO, LDAP, OAuth2, and SAML support. Okta alternative.

name: Keycloak
description: Open-source identity and access management. Enterprise SSO, user federation, and social login.

name: Traefik
description: Modern reverse proxy and load balancer. Automatic SSL with Let's Encrypt and dynamic configuration.

name: Nginx
description: High-performance web server and reverse proxy. Fast, lightweight, and battle-tested.

name: Caddy
description: Modern web server with automatic HTTPS. Zero-config SSL certificates via Let's Encrypt.

name: Portainer
description: Docker management UI. Manage containers, images, volumes, and networks through a web interface.

name: Mailcow
description: Complete mail server solution with webmail, IMAP, SMTP, spam filtering, and admin panel.

name: Mailu
description: Simple yet full-featured mail server. Webmail, antispam, antivirus, and easy setup.

name: Docker Mailserver
description: Production-ready fullstack mail server. SMTP, IMAP, LDAP, antispam, antivirus, and more.

name: BookStack
description: Simple, self-hosted wiki platform. Organize documentation with books, chapters, and pages.

name: Wiki.js
description: Modern wiki powered by Node.js. Beautiful, fast, and feature-rich documentation platform.

name: Outline
description: Team knowledge base and wiki. Real-time collaboration with beautiful UI. Notion alternative.

name: WordPress
description: Popular content management system. Power 43% of the web with plugins and themes.

name: Ghost
description: Modern publishing platform for blogs and newsletters. Clean, fast, and focused on content.

name: Strapi
description: Headless CMS for modern applications. Build powerful APIs with a user-friendly admin panel.

name: Directus
description: Open-source data platform. Instantly turn any SQL database into an API and admin app.

name: Listmonk
description: Self-hosted newsletter and mailing list manager. High-performance email marketing platform.

name: Mautic
description: Open-source marketing automation platform. Email campaigns, landing pages, and lead tracking.

name: Chatwoot
description: Open-source customer engagement platform. Live chat, email, social media, and helpdesk in one place.
